text: Hey! Sounds great about your new project, have fun with Unreal! Is it another group one?
No problem about your new schedule! I can be available most lunchtimes (1pm-2pm) and after work at around 7.30pm most days - would Monday work for you?

I went to an exhibition earlier this year called 'Wiltshire B4 Christ' and it was a sort of gallery of photography/fashion/artifacts with a focus on; Stonehenge and Neolithic Britain meets Rave culture! :alien:
This vid sums it up quite well: <https://thevinylfactory.com/store-x-the-vinyl-factory/jeremy-deller-on-new-exhibition-wiltshire-b4-christ/>

attachments.title: Jeremy Deller on new exhibition WILTSHIRE B4 CHRIST
attachments.fallback: The Vinyl Factory: Jeremy Deller on new exhibition WILTSHIRE B4 CHRIST

text:
I figure you'll find loads of reference for traditional Celtic imagery online, but this is something that's a bit out-there and different!?
(It wasn't the most amazing exhibition ever but I felt something pretty cool and interesting was bubbling within the concept of it....!) :thinking_face:

Also,
This email went around work today - you might be interested, I think it's going to be a quite active group with regular meet-ups etc. :tada:

_"Hi all,
With Pride Month rapidly approaching, ACCESS: VFX along with a group of like-minded folks from the London visual effects community are thrilled to introduce ‘Q-VFX’ (Queer- VFX), a new LGBTQIA+ community hub where both current staff and aspiring talent can access information, events, mentorship and support.
We are working towards growing a supportive queer community/space that travels with you wherever you work. Regular meet-ups and outreach events will be held all in the spirit of ACCESS: VFX’s core mission of actively pursuing and encouraging inclusion, diversity and opportunity across our incredible visual effects, animation and games industries.

Today is our launch day, and we’re excited to get the word out, but the official Q-VFX kickoff event is planned for June so look out for more details to follow. Q-VFX will be run by a diverse group of people from different companies, positions and backgrounds and is designed to be fully inclusive of everyone in the LGBTQIA+ community. We cannot wait to share more with you!

If this sounds like something you would like to be a part of, please sign up to our mailing list at <http://www.accessvfx.org/qvfx|www.accessvfx.org/qvfx> and let us know.
To find out more you can listen to our launch podcast here and join our Facebook group.

Thanks!
The Q-VFX team"_

attachments.title: 05: QVFX Launches! by accessvfx
attachments.text:
ACCESS: VFX along with a group of like-minded folks from the VFX, animation and games community are thrilled to introduce ‘Q-VFX’, a new, inclusive LGBTQI+ community hub where both our staff and aspiring talent can access information, events, mentorship and support.
For more details visit
attachments.fallback: SoundCloud Audio: 05: QVFX Launches! by accessvfx

text: I look forward to hearing how you're getting on! Happy Friday and have a great weekend! :raised_hands:
